languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer dodges an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击时，都会立刻成为攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者闪避攻击时，都会立刻成为攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

languages.text: 使用者が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}すると、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}となる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が攻撃を回避するたびに、着用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}となる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque, se convierte en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} del atacante hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador esquiva un ataque, se convierte en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} del atacante hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, wird er für den Angreifer bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einem Angriff ausweicht, wird er für den Angreifer zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}, und zwar bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Уклонившись{/g} от атаки, персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для атакующего до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Уклонившись от атаки, персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для атакующего до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
Уклонившись от атаки, персонаж становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для атакующего до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque, il devient une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour l'attaquant jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur esquive une attaque, il devient une {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} pour l'attaquant jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} hâline gelir. Bu etki, takan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
